RegisteredContentScriptOptions.description: Details of a content script registered programmatically

css.description: The list of CSS files to inject

js.description: The list of JS files to inject

allFrames.description: If allFrames is true, implies that the JavaScript or CSS should be injected into all frames of current page. By default, it's false and is only injected into the top frame.

matchAboutBlank.description: If matchAboutBlank is true, then the code is also injected in about:blank and about:srcdoc frames if your extension has access to its parent document. Code cannot be inserted in top-level about:-frames. By default it is false.

allOf.description: The soonest that the JavaScript or CSS will be injected into the tab. Defaults to "document_idle".

RegisteredContentScript.description: An object that represents a content script registered programmatically

functions.name: unregister
functions.description: Unregister a content script registered programmatically
